api_key.description: API key from your [account](https://airtable.com/account) page. You can set this via the `AIRTABLE_API_KEY` environment variable as well.

table.description: Name of the table from which to query information.

view.description: Name of the view from which to query information.

workspace_id.description: ID of the workspace in Airtable, you can find this in the base URL on your [Bases page](https://airtable.com/) when logged in.

block.description: The `airtable_table` resource allows you to read information from a table for use in other Terraform resources.
